XRFrameGetViewerPose.summary: The getViewerPose() method, a member of the interface, returns a object which describes the viewer's pose (position and orientation) relative to the specified reference space.

remarks.para: See the method for a way to calculate a pose that represents the difference between two spaces.

XRFrameGetViewerPose.returns:
A describing the viewer's position and orientation relative
to the specified reference space.
